4 as above page 2 insert a lifeline barber cord or spare cable in round 4 of this latvian braid break cc ruffle leave mc attached on the outside of the mitt with cc2 round 1 - 2 k to end round 3 k1 kfb to end 72 stitches round 4 k to end lace row 5 yo k4 sk2p k4 yo k work row 5 & 6 six times per round pm between repeats row 6 k 12 repeat rounds 5 & 6 four more times bind off loosely break cc2 twisted rib pick up 48 sts from lifeline and divide evenly onto needle 1 & needle 2 remove lifeline with mc round 1 needle 1 kfb k1tbl p1 to last st kfb repeat on needle 2 52 sts total rounds 2 - 6 k1tbl p1 to end bind off loosely in pattern 3 cast on and knit cuff per previous directions page 2 left hand/thumb from this point forward the palm
